Text:
Next time you upload a Movie DVDR torrent, I suggest you do the following:

1. Name the torrent posting according to the movie's title. Do not assume that the millions of TPB users are mind readers.

2. Don't upload DVDR movies to the Audio Other category. They belong in Movies DVDR.
